line.text: Like as to make our appetite more keen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With eager compounds we our palate urge
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As to prevent our maladies unseen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: We sicken to shun sickness when we purge
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even so being full of your neer-cloying sweetness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To bitter sauces did I frame my feeding
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And sick of welfare found a kind of meetness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To be diseased ere that there was true needing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thus policy in love t anticipate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The ills that were not grew to faults assured
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And brought to medicine a healthful state
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which rank of goodness would by ill be cured
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thence I learn and find the lesson true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
